appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: Download lecture and exercise videos directly from RWTHmoodle to your local device.

downloadError.message: Could not load downloads for this video.
downloadError.description: Error message shown when an error occurs

noDownloads.message: No download is available for this video.

agreement.message: This video can be downloaded using the unofficial RWTHmoodle video download extension. Please confirm that the lecturer is permitting you to download the video. Your confirmation will be stored for this lecture.
agreement.description: Message shown when download is available but no confirmation has been submitted yet.
